name: User can open and view book's details in the Book Store

steps.name: Click on '9781449325862' book title-link in the books table
Check value of the 'ISBN' field on book details
Check value of the 'TITLE' field on book details
Check value of the 'SUB_TITLE' field on book details
Check value of the 'AUTHOR' field on book details
